description:

Wesper is looking for a smart and creative engineer to lead our AI/ML efforts and product initiatives.  * Work with CTO, VP R&D, and software leadership to shape and commercialize Wesper’s AI/ML strategy

 * Participate in Wesper’s discovery and evolution efforts into generative AI
 * Assist with ongoing post-market maintenance of AI/ML applications, including defect resolution and general enhancements
 * Generate documentation as necessary for internal and customer-facing objectives
   
   

Requirements


 * BS/MS in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering or equivalent
 * 2+ years experience shipping modern AI/ML solutions

 * Strong Python skills
   
   

ADVANTAGES


 * Experience working in a fast-paced / start-up environment
 * Experience with conventional signal processing applications
 * Experience with MATLAB
   
   

OUR TEAM— Built for Good

We pride ourselves on transparent communication— open discussion is critical to our performance and is how we continue to grow. We focus on accountability, humility, and constant learning. We believe in finding a better way through the use of data and attention to detail. We work towards making sleep medicine easy and we do it for our users.

 * Friendly, nerdy coworkers
 * Daily stand-ups and open door policy
 * Encouragement to pursue initiatives
 * Flexible paid time off
 * Casual dress
 * Support for personal development
 * Referral bonuses
   
   

About Wesper

Mission-driven startup aiming to make accurate sleep testing more convenient, affordable, and

accessible.

Sleep disorders are a hidden epidemic that reduces quality and length of life for more than

10% of the population. The difficulty in diagnosing and monitoring sleep conditions is a major

obstacle to the health of 100Ms of people worldwide.

Wesper is transforming the sleep industry by shrinking an entire sleep lab to a single wearable

patch, helping millions live better, longer lives. Our platform delivers consumer comfort with

clinical performance by using cutting-edge sensor design, a cloud-native suite of state-of-the-art

algorithms and a sleek mobile app, creating a seamless experience for both patient and doctor.

description:
BallerTV is a venture-backed startup building the world's largest sports network from the ground up. To date, our AI and computer vision video technology have enabled us to be the world's most prolific producer of live youth sports streams. We film games using a custom ultra-wide fisheye lens to capture an entire basketball court, soccer field, or volleyball court at once. Then we use machine learning to detect the playing area, the people, the balls, and anything else we need to completely understand the scene. We combine all of that information to create a trajectory for our virtual camera to follow the action similarly to how a videographer would film. Rather than relying on a physical actuator, we virtually move the camera by re-projecting the fisheye view. We then live stream the video anywhere in the world.
